titleStmt.title: The new earth, or, The true Magna Charta of the past ages, and of the ages or world to come: called The Jews commonweal. Written by an unworthy witness of the truth of the great God, John Brayne.
titleStmt.author: Brayne, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Moon, at the seven stars in Paul's Church-yard, neer the great North-door.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven stars in Paul's Church-yard, neer the great North-door.
